title: Lely Palms ProMedica Senior Living - ProMedica Senior Living Communities

content.hospiceName: Welcome To Lely Palms A ProMedica Senior Living Community (Naples)
content.title: Senior Living At Its Best
content.description: Located on 28 acres of beautifully tropical landscaped property in Naples, Florida, Lely Palms ProMedica Senior Living offers independent living for persons ages 55 and over. Lely Palms also offers the only retirement villa rentals in Naples. Choose from an all-inclusive rental package, general rental, or trial stay – with an array of floor plans including studios, alcoves, one and two bedroom apartments. Our rental community is designed for your active and healthy lifestyle.

featuresAmenities.content:
Independent Living Apartments and Villas
Full-service rental plans for those looking to simplify their lifestyle
General rental plans to customize and add the services you desire
One of the few Naples area Continuing Care Retirement Communities (CCRC) with rental units

floorPlansVariety.content: Whether you choose one of our four apartment floor plans (studio, alcove, one & two bedroom) or decide to reside in a spacious Villa, you will love calling Lely Palms home.

content.floorPlansDescription:
Floor Plans

Variety of Floor Plans

As a full-service senior living community designed for your active lifestyle, Lely Palms is pleased to offer a wide selection of spacious accommodations that meet individual desires and needs. Our apartments feature studio, alcoves, one and two bedroom styles including screened or glassed enclosed lanais.

Our villas, many with a scenic lake view, are Naples only rental retirement villas. They feature private entrances, carports, screened or glassed lanais and two styles of floorplans with two bedrooms and baths.

generalServices: Two meals a day including continental breakfast and a choice of lunch or dinner
Weekly housekeeping (including flat linen laundry service)
Transportation for social activities and medical appointments
Cable television and all utilities except telephone and internet service included

generalAmenities: Sparkling lakes with comfortable gazebos and meandering pathways
Minutes away from Naples’ shopping, fine dining, cultural and recreational opportunities and the pristine beaches of the Gulf of Mexico
expandedAmenities: Daily social, recreational and cultural activities

payment.paymentInfo:
Payment

Payment Information

Lely Palms Retirement offers month-to-month rent with no buy-in fees. Some of your medical needs may be covered through Medicare, Medicaid or managed care and commercial insurance. You may be eligible for additional benefits outlined below. Our admissions team will be happy to provide information to understand your options.

veterans.veteranBenefits: The Aid and Attendance Benefit is a pension program offered by the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs to eligible veterans and their surviving spouses. This benefit can provide a significant monthly income to those who need assisted living or similar services. For many of our residents, this benefit program has enabled them to receive the care they need at a cost they can afford.
veterans.processingApproval:
Processing & Approval

Processing and approval can generally take 4-8 months or longer. Once approved, the pension is paid directly to the applicant and is retroactive to the first of the month following the VA’s receipt of the application.

The care and services we provide at our community will qualify you in receiving this benefit. We will be happy to help you learn more about the Aid and Attendance program.
requirements: The veteran must have served at least 90 days of total service, with at least one day during a period of war (WWII, Korean or Vietnam).
The veteran or spouse must have a physical or mental condition which requires the care or assistance of another person on a regular basis.
There are income considerations, however, most people in assisted living communities qualify for the maximum benefit amount because their cost of the care is greater than their fixed monthly income.
The VA does look at assets in making the determination, however, with proper planning most people can become eligible, regardless of worth.
Unfortunatley, divorce makes a surviving spouse ineligible for benefits.

content.specialNeeds:
Special Needs Communications

We are committed to communicating with sensory impaired persons and persons with limited English proficiency. If you need assistance with understanding communications because of a hearing, language, sensory or sight impairment, we will provide the appropriate intervention to help with communication.

Appropriate auxiliary aids are provided at no charge to persons with disabilities when necessary to ensure effective communication with patients/residents and their companions, including any family member, friend or associate of a person seeking or receiving services with whom communication is appropriate. Free auxiliary aids may include, but are not limited to: sign language interpreters, TTYs, note takers, written materials, telephone handset amplifiers, assistive listening devices, closed caption decoders, and other services.

title: Linden Village A ProMedica Senior Living Community - ProMedica Senior Living Communities

content.hospiceName: Welcome To Linden Village A ProMedica Senior Living Community
content.title: Senior Living At Its Best
content.description: Linden Village ProMedica Senior Living is nestled on Tuck Court, sharing a campus with ProMedica Skilled Nursing and Rehabilitation in Lebanon, Pennsylvania. Linden Village residents can take advantage of a long list of services: health care, personal care, social programs and wellness programs all delivered by a warm, caring and knowledgeable staff.

featuresAmenities.content:
Month-to-month Rent
No Buy-in Fees
Small Pets Welcome

floorPlansVariety.content: Each home-like cottage features 16 private bedrooms, which offer plenty of closet space and private full or half baths.

content.floorPlansDescription:
Floor Plans

Linden Village has four cottages with a shared community center.

floorPlansDetails.floorPlanName: Stoy Tabor / Mt. Hope Cottage - Full Bath

designLayout.designLayoutDescription:
Design & Layout

Friendly, Familiar & Safe

A lot of planning went into making Linden Village feel as much like home as possible - warm, friendly, familiar and safe. Every aspect of daily life has been taken into consideration based on our residents’ needs.
designLayout.communityLayout:
Community Layout

The layout is of the campus is a self-contained community which is residential by design. The Linden Village campus is comprised of four one-story cottages and a central Community Center.

There is also a secured courtyard for gardening and enjoying the outdoors. While bedrooms can be fully furnished, many of our residents like to bring some favorite furniture from home. The common rooms are cozy and inviting, and the furniture is comfortable. Resident families frequently use our spacious, inviting common areas during visits to the community.

Our Community Center is our heart of the community with a Great Room for activities, a health center and a beauty/barber shop.
designLayout.residentialAcommodations:
Residential Accommodations

Two of the cottages care for persons living with memory loss and two are personal care communities. Each cottage has:

  • Three of the cottages care for persons living with memory loss and one is a personal care community.
  • The security of a 24-hour emergency call system in each bedroom
  • Living room
  • Dining room
  • Kitchen
  • Laundry room
  • Plenty of cozy living spaces for socializing or spending private time relaxing with a good book
  • Direct access to the outdoors through porches, patios, courtyards and walkways
designLayout.memoryCareServices:
Memory Care Services at Linden Village

The staff at Linden Village knows residents living with memory loss require a unique approach to caregiving; one created to help people living with Alzheimer’s disease and related forms of dementia enjoy residential living, while receiving the professional assistance they need, 24-hours a day. At Linden Village, everything in our two secured cottages - from staffing to programs to environment - has been researched, developed and designed for our residents’ specific needs. These special cottages are a welcome answer for both our residents and their families; a new caregiving alternative for the time when home care is no longer possible, but skilled nursing care is not necessary.
designLayout.safety:
Safety

Residents do not leave the closely monitored confines of Linden Village, yet rarely feel restricted. They move freely about the community, both indoors and outdoors, without leaving our secure environment. The common areas encourage the enjoyment of interaction and socialization without sacrificing safety.

healthServices: Tailored Health and Wellness Management facilitated through advisory physicians, nurses and professional caregivers
Keeping an active lifestyle which includes outings, exercise programs and a wide array of programming throughout the community
24-hour supervision by staff specially trained in Alzheimer’s and dementia care
Monitoring—blood pressure, vital signs, weight, etc.
Responding to and treating health problems
Outside rehabilitation and physical therapy services available
socialServices: Socialization with other residents, staff members and visitors
personalServices: Maintenance-free living provided by our building services staff
Assistance available for activities of daily living
foodServices: Delicious, home-style meals served three times a day and snacks
Special preparation and presentation of food to meet the unique needs and varied abilities of our residents
additionalServices: Assisting with special services like shoe shining, clothes mending, dry cleaning, etc.

We are committed to communicating with sensory impaired persons and persons with limited English proficiency. If you need assistance with understanding communications because of a hearing, language, sensory or sight impairment, we will provide the appropriate intervention to help with communication.

Appropriate auxiliary aids are provided at no charge to persons with disabilities when necessary to ensure effective communication with patients/residents and their companions, including any family member, friend or associate of a person seeking or receiving services with whom communication is appropriate. title: The Commons (Perrysburg) - ProMedica Senior Living Communities

content.title: Senior Living At Its Best
content.description: Conveniently located on Fremont Pike near Interstate 75 and sharing a campus with ProMedica Skilled Nursing and Rehabilitation,  The Commons offers all-inclusive monthly independent living rental options for persons ages 55 and over. Our community is designed for your active and healthy lifestyle offering an array of floor plans including studios, one and two bedroom apartments.  Take a look yourself or experience first-hand with our short-stay trial period option.

featuresAmenities.content:
Month-to-month Rent
No buy-in Fees
Small Pets Welcome
Monthly Community Diabetes Program

floorPlansVariety.content: The Commons, a ProMedica Senior Living Community offers six different spacious floor plans.

content.floorPlansDescription:
Floor Plans

Variety of Floor Plans

Perrysburg Commons Retirement Center offers six different spacious floor plans. Our one and two bedroom apartments offer kitchens with full-size appliances and our studios offer kitchenettes. All apartments are equipped with a number of safety features to give you peace of mind.

Transportation to appointments (with 2 week notice given) by our chauffeur

title: ProMedica Charlotte Stephenson Manor - ProMedica Senior Living Communities

content.hospiceName: Welcome To Charlotte Stephenson - A ProMedica Senior Living Community
content.title: Assisted Living and Memory Care
content.description: No longer able to live alone, but want to maintain some independence? Supportive and dignified assisted living is your solution. ProMedica Charlotte Stephenson Manor provides assisted living and memory care services in their community located in Adrian, Michigan.

featuresAmenities.content:
Dining and Housekeeping Services
Medication Management
Secure dementia unit

floorPlansVariety.content: Charlotte Stephenson Manor offers three floor plan options. All apartments are equipped with a number of safety features to give you peace of mind.

content.floorPlansDescription:
Floor Plans

Variety of Floor Plans

Choose from among three apartment styles for singles or married couples:

  • The L-shaped studio with a private sleeping area
  • A deluxe studio apartment with separate living and sleeping areas
  • A spacious one-bedroom apartment with living room

Download the apartment layout guide

floorPlansDetails.floorPlanDetail: This apartment has living/sitting room, bedroom, over-sized bathroom, kitchenette with refrigerator/freezer, and view of outlying country scenery.
This apartment has separate sitting and sleeping areas, over-sized bathroom, kitchenette with refrigerator/freezer, and view of outlying country scenery or courtyard.

This apartment has an "L" shaped design to allow privacy for sleeping and an area for sitting or entertainment. Contains an over-sized bathroom, kitchenette with refrigerator/freezer, and view of outlying country scenery or courtyard.

healthServices: Assistance with activities of daily living
Activities and programs designed to engage people with memory impairments.
socialServices: Community room with daily engaging social and fitness activities
Off-site outings include trips to the local senior center & Croswell Opera House
Faith based services and Bible studies

Personal dining experience provided from individual servers
Oversight from registered dietitian for specific diets
Use of homemade recipes made fresh daily
foodServices: Easy access to hospital care, emergency services and other medical services
additionalServices: Individually washed laundry services including daily fresh towels and linens as needed
24 hour security system including an emergency call system for each apartment

generalAmenities: Daily social, recreational and cultural activities

Twin bed and night stand are included or bring your own furniture
Free Wi-Fi and extended cable TV service
Utilities including electric, heat and water

title: Springhouse ProMedica Senior Living (Pikesville) - ProMedica Senior Living Communities

content.hospiceName: Welcome To Springhouse A ProMedica Senior Living Community (Pikesville)
content.title: Senior Living At Its Best
content.description: Springhouse ProMedica Senior Living is located just northwest of Baltimore in Pikesville, Maryland. Springhouse is a gracious assisted living community designed specifically to provide supportive care for seniors. With 20 years of experience, Springhouse is a place that gives residents control over their lives and reduces the stress of household management. Our community is a place which enhances life through wellness programs, activities, socialization and personal care services - a place with warm, caring and knowledgeable staff.

rightTime.content:
Missed medication doses
Weight loss due to lack of eating
Poor personal hygiene
Loneliness, anxiety and depression
Frequent emergency room visits

floorPlansVariety.content: Springhouse offers a selection of beautiful, private apartments to fit the differing needs of our seniors.

content.floorPlansDescription:
Floor Plans

Variety of Floor Plans

Each Springhouse apartment is equipped with a kitchenette and a full, private bath. Residents can enjoy the spacious garden courtyard, restaurant-style dining, a library, game room, art studio and beauty salon.

Responding to and treating health problems
On-site physical, occupational, and speech rehabilitation services from HCR ManorCare

Individually controlled heating and air conditioning
